lines.i:
The section contains information on the delivered fetus. Note, if there is a multiple delivery, there will be a separate report for each delivered fetus. The content of the section is drawn from labor and delivery records and from the patient's medical record.
The reader should note that the subject of this section - the delivered fetus - is different from the overall subject of the clinical document - which is the mother.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.4"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCSECT" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:76)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:78)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:77)
A code value that indicates the nature of the section - it contains information regarding the delivered fetus.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:79)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] subject (CONF:452)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SBJ" (CONF:65)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedSubject (CONF:453)
This relatedSubject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PRS" (CONF:67)
This relatedSubject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] subject (CONF:454)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN" (CONF:69)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:70)
This subject MAY contain zero or one [0..1] name (CONF:72)
A name provided for the fetus.
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode (CONF:73), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1 AdministrativeGenderCode) (CONF:74)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:81)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Plurality (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.41)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:82)
Record birth order if not a single delivery.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Birth Order (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.16)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:83)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Number of Infants Born Alive (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.37)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:85)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Autopsy Performance (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.15)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:86)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Fetal Death Occurrance (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.22)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF:87)
There may be multiple congenital anomalies recorded. At least one observation will be present in the case that none are present.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Congenital Anomaly (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.19)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:88)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Fetal Delivery Time (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.23)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCSECT" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:76)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:78)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:77)
A code value that indicates the nature of the section - it contains information regarding the delivered fetus.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:79)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SBJ" (CONF:65)

This relatedSubject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PRS" (CONF:67)
This relatedSubject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] subject (CONF:454)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN" (CONF:69)

This subject MAY contain zero or one [0..1] name (CONF:72)
A name provided for the fetus.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:81)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Plurality (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.41)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:82)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Birth Order (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.16)
Record birth order if not a single delivery.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:83)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Number of Infants Born Alive (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.37)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF:87)

There may be multiple congenital anomalies recorded. At least one observation will be present in the case that none are present.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:88)
